name: Devilflame Juggler
description: The Devilflame Juggler is a large, agile fiend with a commanding presence and a penchant for fire magic, often seen juggling hellfire in battle.
memorable: Its ability to split fireball attacks among multiple targets and steal items makes it a cunning and dangerous foe.
goals: To overwhelm foes with agility and magical prowess while sowing chaos through fire and poison.
relations: Related to other devil types, often encountered alongside fiends or as minions of more powerful masters.
environment: Typically found in fiery or chaotic places, often in hellish realms or battlefields rife with magic.
strengths: Possesses Devil's Sight allowing it to see through magical darkness and Magic Resistance granting advantage on saves against spells.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks using silvered weapons.
attacks: Employs a combination of slashing and fire damage through Deft Touch and can launch explosive fireballs at a distance.
most_powerful_ability: The Fiery Flourish can deal massive area damage and ignite targets with hellfire balls that can bounce to multiple enemies.
senses: Has Devil's Sight allowing it to see through magical darkness.
skills: Displays high proficiency in Wisdom saving throws, making it resilient against spells targeting its mind.
additional_information: Impressive jumping ability enhances its mobility in combat.
Can poison enemies simply by moving past them.
Exceptional Dexterity provides evasiveness in battle.
Can communicate telepathically within a large radius.
Uncanny Dodge allows it to mitigate damage from attacks.
